name: Crimson Crystal Tear
locations: In front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.
Found on an altar guarded by enemies at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts.

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
locations: Dropped by Wormface in Altus Plateau.

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
description: Steadily restores HP for a time.
locations: Weeping Peninsula beneath the Minor Erdtree: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Crimson Bubbletear
locations: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding the Minor Erdtree in the east of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
locations: Mountaintops of the Giants: On a cliff ledge south of Giants' Gravepost (above the grace point, the ledge is accessed by going north-east from the Foot of the Forge grace point, Just follow the edge of the cliff until you see the path going above Giant's Gravepost).

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
locations: One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.
One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding the Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East).

name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
locations: Mt. Gelmir: Minor Erdtree, drops from Ulcerated Tree Spirit. Directly East of the Road of Iniquity Site of Grace.

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
locations: Mistwood: Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood along with the Spiked Cracked Tear.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
locations: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar found at the Minor Erdtree in Caelid, east of Smoldering Church.

name: Strength-knot Crystal Tear
locations: Stormhill: Head Northeast from Stormhill Shack to the cliffs. Look for a small, stone receptacle on the ground.

name: Dexterity-knot Crystal Tear
locations: Can be found at the top of a small island at Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Intelligence-knot Crystal Tear
locations: From Road to the Manor Site of Grace, head southeast down the slope and turn back towards north. Loot from a small, half-bowl structure guarded by a few Lesser Spider Hand and one Spider Hand.

name: Faith-knot Crystal Tear
locations: North of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins. Directly east of the Church of Pilgrimage, just down the cliff. It's in a bowl under a tree and surrounded by poison flower enemies.

name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
description: Makes attacks more likely to break enemy stances.
locations: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Avatar near the second Minor Erdtreein Caelid.

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
description: Enhances charged attacks for a time.
locations: Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood along with the Greenspill Crystal Tear.

name: Thorny Cracked Tear
locations: Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
locations: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.
Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
locations: Defeat the Erdtree Avatar found in Liurnia of the Lakes, under the Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast) east of the Mausoleum Compound Site of Grace.

name: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
locations: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar found at the Minor Erdtree in Caelid, east of Smoldering Church.

name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
locations: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
locations: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Opaline Bubbletear
description: Significantly negates next instance of damage.
locations: Weeping Peninsula, beneath the Minor Erdtree: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Opaline Hardtear
locations: Dropped by Putrid Avatar in Northeastern Caelid.

name: Speckled Hardtear
locations: Defeat Wormface at Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau).

name: Leaden Hardtear
locations: Drops from Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Windy Crystal Tear
description: Enhances dodge rolls for a time.
locations: The item can be found in Caelid in a pit southeast of the Nomadic Merchant. One of the birds watches over it, facing south.

name: Winged Crystal Tear
locations: Found on an altar surrounded by Skull enemies just outside the Capital Outskirts.

name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
description: Briefly stop rune loss on death. Takes precedence over Sacrificial Twig when active.
locations: Found on an altar guarded by enemies at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts.

name: Purifying Crystal Tear
description: Purifies the Lord of Blood's curse in a mixed physick.
locations: It can be found at the Second Church of Marika after defeating the invader Bloody Finger Eleonora. (See questline for Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.)
